CustomField.description: Captures the Scheduled Start date and time of the related Service Appointment (for on-site Service Appointments). Populated once Service Appointment is created via Process Builder rule.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the Scheduled Start date and time of the related Service Appointment (for on-site Service Appointments). Populated once Service Appointment is created via Process Builder rule.
CustomField.label: Scheduled Date and Time
